headline: How A 2X Leveraged AI Server ETF Gained 20% in Minutes
summary: When a single-stock leveraged ETF launches, it’s either a gift to speculators or a trap for the unwary. Defiance Daily Target 2X Long SMCI ETF (NYSEARCA:SMCX) falls into the former category right now, but the window may be narrower than it appears. The fund, which launched August 21, 2024, seeks to deliver twice the daily ... How A 2X Leveraged AI Server ETF Gained 20% in Minutes

headline: Super Micro Record Q2 And Higher Outlook Highlight AI Server Tradeoffs
summary: Super Micro Computer (NasdaqGS:SMCI) reported record fiscal Q2 earnings, driven by strong demand for its AI optimized servers. The company highlighted major new infrastructure design wins in the AI data center segment during the quarter. Following this momentum, Super Micro raised its full year 2026 revenue outlook above its earlier expectations. Super Micro focuses on high performance, modular server and storage systems that are widely used in AI data centers, cloud infrastructure, and...
